testimonial.heading: What Our Users Are Saying
testimonial.description: Join the ranks of delighted customers who have transformed their spaces with our AI technology

items.name: Jessica Lee
items.comment: I was blown away by how quickly I could visualize my dream living room. The designs are stunning!

items.name: David Smith
items.comment: As a busy professional, the AI generator saved me time and provided innovative layout ideas I never considered.

items.name: Emily Turner
items.comment: The customization options are fantastic! It feels great to have a personal touch in my home design.

faq.heading: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Get answers to your inquiries about our AI Interior Design Generator

items.title: What types of rooms can I design?
items.description: You can generate designs for various spaces including living rooms, bedrooms, kitchens, and offices. Our AI adapts to your specified dimensions and style.

items.title: Is there a limit to how many designs I can create?
items.description: No, you can generate as many designs as you like! Each user receives unlimited access to create innovative room layouts.

items.title: Can I use the designs for commercial purposes?
items.description: Yes! You can utilize the generated designs for personal or commercial projects such as renovations or property staging.

items.title: How does the privacy of my information work?
items.description: All design inputs are processed directly on your device, ensuring that your ideas and personal information remain secure and private.

footer.heading: Ready to Redesign Your Space?
footer.description: Try the AI Interior Design Generator now to reimagine your home. No sign-up required.
